segments.text: No , I ‘ Ve been waiting for ages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s so unreliable . I ’ Ve been late for my meetings all this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , me too . I think I ’ Ve lost some important clients recently because of this train !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my customers have started to complain too !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh look ! Here it comes now !
segments.speaker: S2
